name: Little Quest
description:
Heya! 

This is a simple game that i came up with as a part of a college project. There are some bugs, but the game is playable. It was made in 3 days.. (Yes i waited too long to start it and had to do a crunch for 3 days.. no sleep). It would be awesome if you could donate as well, im a student so every little helps :)! But don't worry if you can't, it's only a short game so not even worthy of a donation xD.

Anyways i would love to hear feed back on it, more from a design perspective as i am aware that there will be bugs :)

Also i did not make most of the assets, however i did make a few (or edited them).

I have also attached the actual project file so if you feel like it you can play around with stuff :) enjoy!

Psssst! I called the game little quest to have an exuse for the game being short :P
